Hero.title: Clean frontend, solid backend, no drama.
Hero.subtitle: I'm David, a Fullstack developer.

About.first_paragraph: I'm a junior developer with a strong focus on building practical, user-centered applications. I enjoy working on projects that solve real problems, from personal tools to business-focused platforms. My background combines hands-on technical experience with a continuous desire to learn and improve in every aspect of software development, across all types of devices and platforms.
About.second_paragraph: I'm especially drawn to clean design, intuitive interfaces, and efficient code. I like understanding how things work under the hood and bringing ideas to life through structured, maintainable development. Every project is an opportunity to grow and refine not only my technical skills, but also my ability to collaborate and deliver meaningful results.
About.third_paragraph: I'm currently looking to join a team where I can contribute to real products, learn from experienced developers, and keep growing as a developer committed to building software that truly makes a difference.

Experience.subtitle: Highlights from my journey
Experience.description: Here's a timeline showcasing the key milestones and experiences that have shaped my path in tech.

Contact.description: You can reach out to me for any inquiries, collaborations, or just to say hello! Fill out the form below and I will get back to you ASAP.
